oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Map of the Mountains of Western North Carolina, 1861
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Prof. A. Guyot
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Preliminary Sketch of a Map of the Mountains of Western North Carolina from the observations of Prof. A. Guyot (Arnold Guyot, 1807-1884), drawn under the direction of E. Sandoz, June 1861. 28.5 x 20.5 inches. Map published in the North Carolina Historical Review (vol. 15, 1938). Color outlines and captions added to the original printed map. Scale: 8 miles=1 inch.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Maps; Great Smoky Mountains;
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Q 912.7686 Great Smoky Mts. 1861 Guyot (scan: Mtns_of_w_carolinas_ret_300dpi)
